name: Mirage Corps - DEMO1
description:
The elven land of Finerdil suffered a surprise invasion by the humans, also known as the "Short Ears", a misterious race from the Northern Continent.
Using superior technology, the humans defeated the Old Governmant, taking control of the land.
However, even after the conquest of their land, the elves continue the fight.
You take the role of Artrisha, a elven girl with agressive and violent ideas.
Will you change her mind about the conflict, or will you make her destructive dreams become true?

- Average 30 minutes of playtime;
- Currently 2 chapters (Finishing the third one, needs translation);
- Modern/Steampunk aesthetic;
- Gameplay based on missions;
- No random encounters;
- If a character die, they are lost forever (Ironman)
- Two routes to choose;
- Base building;
- Character customization and crafting (Work in progress);

There may be some translations errors.

CONTROLS:

Use the arrow keys to move, Z and X to navegate between menus.

Enter and the Spacebar can be used to interact.

You can also move your character using the mouse cursor.
